text: Ruguo nimen bu xiangzhu ta, name, an la que yi xiangzhu tale. Dangshi, bu xindao de renmen ba ta quzhu chujing, zhiyou yige ren yu ta tongxing, dangshi, ta lia zai shandong li, ta dui ta de tongban shuo:“Buyao youchou, an la que shi he women zai yiqi de.” An la jiu ba ningjing jiang gei ta, erqie yi nimen kan bujian de jundui fuzhu ta, bingqie shi bu xindao zhe de yanci bian cheng zui beijian de; er an la de yanci que shi zuigao shang de. An la shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de
